{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12873v1", "title": "On a category of extensions whose endomorphism rings have at most four
  maximal ideals", "summary": "We describe the endomorphism ring of a short exact sequences $0 \to A_R \to
B_R \to C_R \to 0$ with $A_R$ and $C_R$ uniserial modules and the behavior of
these short exact sequences as far as their direct sums are concerned.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA", "published": "2025-04-17T12:02:19Z"}
